scripts.install-python-dev: echo --Install python dependencies-- && pip install -r requirements-general.txt -r requirements-dev-only.txt
scripts.start: echo --Run python flask server (venv required)-- && cross-env FLASK_APP=src/server.py:app FLASK_ENV=development flask run
scripts.pytests: echo --Run python tests (unittest, venv required)-- && python -m unittest discover -f -t . -s src -p *_test.py
scripts.pylint-flake: echo --Run python linter (flake8, venv required)-- && flake8 src
scripts.pylint: echo --Run python linter (pylint, venv required)-- && pylint index.py index.wsgi src
scripts.pyformat: echo --Run python formatter (autopep8, venv required)-- && autopep8 src
scripts.eslint: echo --Run js linter (eslint)-- && npx eslint static/js/**.js
scripts.lint: echo --Run all linters-- && npm-run-all pylint eslint
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all formatters, linters and tests-- && npm-run-all format lint test
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
